languages.text: "Ты же только что сказал, что это — скверна? И ты собираешься засунуть в нее руку по локоть и изучать? Тебе самому не противно?"
"You just said this thing is an abomination. Yet you are going to immerse yourself in it in order to study it? Doesn't the thought repel you?"
languages.original_text: "Ты же только что сказал, что это — скверна? И ты собираешься засунуть в нее руку по локоть и изучать? Тебе самому не противно?"

traits.locale_text: "You just said this thing is an abomination. Yet you are going to immerse yourself in it in order to study it? Doesn't the thought repel you?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You just said this thing is an abomination. Yet you are going to immerse yourself in it in order to study it? Doesn't the thought repel you?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You just said this thing is an abomination. Yet you are going to immerse yourself in it in order to study it? Doesn't the thought repel you?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You just said this thing is an abomination. Yet you are going to immerse yourself in it in order to study it? Doesn't the thought repel you?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “你刚刚才说这台机器面目可憎，可现在你就要沉浸于对它的研究之中。这个想法不会让你觉得厌恶吗？”
languages.original_text: "You just said this thing is an abomination. Yet you are going to immerse yourself in it in order to study it? Doesn't the thought repel you?"

traits.locale_text: “你刚刚才说这台机器面目可憎，可现在你就要沉浸于对它的研究之中。这个想法不会让你觉得厌恶吗？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Acaba de decir que esta cosa es una abominación, ¿y ahora vas a abandonarte a ella para estudiarla? ¿No le repugna la idea?».
languages.original_text: "You just said this thing is an abomination. Yet you are going to immerse yourself in it in order to study it? Doesn't the thought repel you?"

traits.locale_text: «Acaba de decir que esta cosa es una abominación, ¿y ahora vas a abandonarte a ella para estudiarla? ¿No le repugna la idea?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「今、こいつを忌まわしきものと言ったわよね。それなのに、それを調べるためにその中に身を浸そうっていうの？おかしいとは思わない？」
languages.original_text: "You just said this thing is an abomination. Yet you are going to immerse yourself in it in order to study it? Doesn't the thought repel you?"

traits.locale_text: 「今、こいつを忌まわしきものと言ったわよね。それなのに、それを調べるためにその中に身を浸そうっていうの？おかしいとは思わない？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt gerade gesagt, dass dieses Ding eine Abscheulichkeit ist. Dennoch werdet Ihr Euch darin vertiefen, um es zu studieren? Stößt Euch dieser Gedanke nicht ab?"
languages.original_text: "You just said this thing is an abomination. Yet you are going to immerse yourself in it in order to study it? Doesn't the thought repel you?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt gerade gesagt, dass dieses Ding eine Abscheulichkeit ist. Dennoch werdet Ihr Euch darin vertiefen, um es zu studieren? Stößt Euch dieser Gedanke nicht ab?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Vous venez de dire que cette chose est une abomination et vous comptez tout de même vous plonger dans son étude ? Cette perspective ne vous répugne-t-elle pas ? »
languages.original_text: "You just said this thing is an abomination. Yet you are going to immerse yourself in it in order to study it? Doesn't the thought repel you?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous venez de dire que cette chose est une abomination et vous comptez tout de même vous plonger dans son étude ? Cette perspective ne vous répugne-t-elle pas ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Az önce bunun menfur bir mahluk olduğunu söylüyordun. Şimdi de etraflıca gözlemlemek mi istiyorsun? Nasıl oluyor da iğrenmiyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "You just said this thing is an abomination. Yet you are going to immerse yourself in it in order to study it? Doesn't the thought repel you?"

traits.locale_text: “Az önce bunun menfur bir mahluk olduğunu söylüyordun. Şimdi de etraflıca gözlemlemek mi istiyorsun? Nasıl oluyor da iğrenmiyorsun?”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
